summary: Encapsulates a HiFi‑GAN neural vocoder that manages model setup, data loading, training, validation, and inference, converting mel‑spectrogram inputs into high‑fidelity waveform audio while supporting export, learning‑rate scheduling, and checkpoint handling.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use high‑quality audio synthesis component for applications such as text‑to‑speech, voice cloning, music generation, and any system that requires converting spectral representations into realistic sound.
